description.narrative: Planeringsbidrag till Civicus för konsultationer inför och planering av regionalt civilsamhällesprogram med medie- och människorättsförsvararkomponenter. Under perioden januari till juni 2019 genomför Civicus möten och planeringsarbete för att planera ett treårigt program kring krympande demokratiskt utrymme i Afrika söder om Sahara med stöd till civilsamhällesorganisationer, människorättsförsvarare och medieaktörer.

Planning grant to Civicus for consultations and planning for a regional Programme on civilsociety, media and human rights defenders. During February to June 2019, Civicus will conduct meetings and planning for a three-year programme on shrinking democratic space in Africa, with support to civil society, human rights defenders and media actors.
The purpose of this planning phase was to create a platform/consortium and a program proposal to address the shrinking democratic space in Africa, including media and human rights defense actors.

description.narrative: Civicus has conducted a five months consultation process in order to deepen the contextual understanding of the upcoming proposed programme. They have identified potential partners and participants, brainstormed solutions and prototyped potential intervention areas. They have organised 1) a context and systems mapping workshop, 2) an "ideation" workshop, and 3) a prototyping workshop. During the workshops they identified the following key challenges: 1. Enabling environment - laws and regulations. 2. Complexity of the civil society landscape. 3. Media and digital rights. 4. People (citizens with different backgrounds may have different priorities). 5. Media consumption (access to media is a question of income-level). 6. Language, storytelling and narratives. 7. Human rights mechanisms and advocacy. 8. Failing trust (media and civil society can be seen as representatives of power). 9. Sustainability and resilience.
